resources.string:
About 



 This is a mobile implementation of Kings Cup card game. You can play this party game without need to directly meet with your friends. Now you can join them via any communication platform and enjoy your kings cup game! 




 Link to original game on Wiki 
 en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kings_(game) 


 You can also visit our github project page 
 github.com/kuzn1/KingsCup
Room creator must first return to lobby

string-array.name: card_description_array
string-array.item: Ace Safe\nEveryone except the person who drew a card has to take a drink
Two for You\nPerson who drew a card choose who will take a drink
Three for Me\nPerson who drew a card has to take a drink
Four Floor\nEveryone have to lower their phone to the ground as fast as possible. Worst time has to take a drink
Five Guys\nEvery male player has to take a drink
Six Chicks\nEvery female player has to take a drink
Seven Heaven\nEveryone have to rise their phone up as fast as possible. Worst time has to take a drink
Eight Random\nRandom person has to take a drink
Queen Question\nPerson who drew a card choose player and question. He has answer or take a drink
Kings Cup\nEveryone has to finish their drink
